DOC.brief_summary: Study of BIBW 2948 BS in Patients with COPD and Chronic Bronchitis
DOC.brief_title: Effect of BIBW 2948 BS in COPD
DOC.criteria: COPD smokers ages between 40 and 70 Significant other diseases abnormal hematology abnormal liver function psychiatric disorders pulmonary obstruction asthma, allergic rhinitis dependance on oxygen patients with history of myocardial infarction patients with history of cancer women of child bearing potential antiplatelet or anticoagulation therapy
